properties.Non_point: Informal disposal of houshold wastes/garbage (polythene, plastic, aluminium containers etc.)
properties.Recommende: Preparing a separate place in homegardens for disposing houshold waste/Awareness programme on how to disposal household waste properly and converting them to usable products such as compost/Facilitating garbage collection
